product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Cuban Coconut Beans and Rice - 2 Servings
long_description: Transport yourself to the Caribbean with just 1 bite of the Backpacker's Pantry Cuban Coconut Black Beans and Rice freeze-dried meal. Includes black beans, rice, coconut and bananas. Remove oil packet and add to other ingredients; add 2.75 cups of boiling water, stir and let sit for 13 min. before eating. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Transport yourself to the Caribbean with just 1 bite of the Backpacker's Pantry Cuban Coconut Black Beans and Rice freeze-dried meal.
